author: akarasulu
msg: o overrided eqauls() method to take into account id and values
o formatting: removed m_, a_ and space before ;
o added test cases for equals()
WARNING: the equals implementation still needs to take into account the
attribute's syntaxes.  It currently does not do that.

author: ajack
msg: Introduced Synchronizer to sync after *both* docs and syndication performed.

author: farra
msg: Change ant project name to avalon-trunk to avoid conflicts in gump with existing avalon definitions

author: farra
msg: The following patches correct the build files in the planet/facilities/http/blocks directory that incorrectly declare the generated blocks as embedded.

author: farra
msg: applying Stephen's patch: The following patch corrects the log4j gump alias under the log4j resource declaration, and secondly, updates the avalon-repository-test project to declare a null type (required so that the gump task does not generate an output declaration).
